mxCell.value: web-ui-admin Administrative web interface for system configuration
web-ui-cluster-orch Cluster lifecycle and management interface
web-ui-infra Infrastructure and device management interface
web-ui-root Main landing page and navigation hub
metadata-broker API gateway for metadata services
traefik Reverse proxy and load balancer for ingress traffic routing
auth-service Authentication and authorization middleware for API requests
certificate-file-server Serves TLS certificates for secure communications
nexus-api-gw API gateway for IAM tenant management
ingress-nginx-controller NGINX ingress for PXE boot services
platform-keycloak Identity provider with SSO, OAuth2, and SAML support
vault HashiCorp Vault for secrets management and encryption
tenancy-manager Multi-tenant isolation and namespace management
keycloak-tenant-controller Automates tenant provisioning in Keycloak
token-fs File-based token storage for service authentication
app-deployment-manager Manages application deployment lifecycle on edge clusters
app-resource-manager Allocates and manages compute resources for applications
app-interconnect-manager Manages service mesh connectivity between applications
app-orch-catalog Application template repository and marketplace
app-service-proxy Proxy service for routing application traffic
cluster-manager Kubernetes cluster lifecycle management and provisioning
cluster-connect-gateway Secure remote access gateway to edge clusters
intel-infra-provider CAPI provider for Intel bare metal infrastructure
fleet-controller Rancher Fleet for multi-cluster GitOps deployments
argocd Continuous deployment via GitOps Managing 89 applications
gitea Self-hosted Git service for source code management
harbor-oci Enterprise container registry with RBAC and replication
harbor-oci-trivy Vulnerability scanner for container images
istiod Istio control plane for traffic management and mTLS
kiali Service mesh observability and topology visualization
calico-node CNI plugin for pod networking and network policies
metallb-controller Bare metal load balancer for services
kyverno Kubernetes policy engine for admission control and validation
cert-manager Automated certificate management and renewal
external-secrets Syncs secrets from external stores to Kubernetes
openebs-localpv-provisioner Dynamic local volume provisioner for pods
minio S3-compatible object storage for artifacts and backups
